title: Solr logo on admin pages should always link back to main admin page
description: The Solr logo on the threaddump, ping and registry admin pages do not link back to the main admin page as the logos on the other pages do.  This patch fixes the hyperlinks in the XSL files for those three admin pages.

comments.author: Shalin Shekhar Mangar
comments.content:
The ping.jsp is deprecated in favor of the PingRequestHandler and it is not being used anymore in the example solrconfig.

I shall commit this shortly.
